title: The Rapid Rise of Threads Appears to Be Hurting Twitter
description: Third-party estimates showed Twitter’s traffic falling, while Meta Platform’s new app hit 100 million sign-ups.

title: Foxconn Abandons India Chip Venture With Vedanta
description: The move is a setback to India’s nascent plans to become a semiconductor manufacturing hub.

title: EU Approves Data-Transfer Deal With U.S.
description: The issue has proved a concern for some of the world’s biggest tech companies, including Meta Platforms and Google.

title: First U.S. Ban on Sale of Cellphone Location Data Might Be Coming
description: Massachusetts considers a law at the vanguard of a broader movement to protect consumer privacy.

title: To Drive AI, Chip Makers Stack 'Chiplets' Like Lego Blocks
description: Some industry executives call the technology one of the most significant advances since the dawn of the integrated circuit more than 60 years ago.
